snippet.title: Sakura Wars | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Sakura Wars takes center stage for the PlayStation 4 on April 28, 2020!

Some of the best creative minds in the anime and JRPG industries have joined forces with SEGA to bring Sakura Wars to a new generation, and a new audience in the West.
 
https://games.sega.com/sakurawars/
